idea: Create an AI-powered personal CFO service for freelancers with dynamic tax forecasting.
desired_outcome: Find a viable go-to-market strategy and risk profile.

idea: Launch a niche marketplace for second-hand EV batteries with quality certification.
desired_outcome: Test feasibility and key failure points.

idea: Build a note-taking app that automatically converts meeting transcripts into project tasks.
Design a browser extension that detects manipulative pricing patterns in ecommerce.
Use recursive agent-based literature synthesis to map contradictions in climate adaptation research.
desired_outcome: Define methodological weaknesses and stronger pipeline design.

idea: Create a framework to evaluate safety claims of autonomous coding agents using adversarial testing.
Implement a company-wide decision log that links assumptions to outcomes for continuous learning.
Use AI to auto-prioritize incident response playbooks based on live telemetry.
Propose a municipal policy that rewards low-emission delivery fleets via dynamic toll discounts.
desired_outcome: Stress-test policy assumptions and side effects.

idea: Create a tutoring system that adapts teaching style based on student frustration signals.
